flavorText: In the cellars beneath Narnam House, a strange and deadly garden grows.

foreignData.flavorText: In den Kellern unter dem Narnam-Gewächshaus wächst ein seltsamer und tödlicher Garten.
foreignData.name: Verborgene Kräuterkundler
foreignData.text: Rebellion — Wenn die Verborgenen Kräuterkundler ins Spiel kommen und falls in diesem Zug eine bleibende Karte unter deiner Kontrolle das Spiel verlassen hat, erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {G}{G}.

foreignData.flavorText: En los sótanos de la mansión Narnam crece un extraño jardín letal.
foreignData.name: Herboristas ocultos
foreignData.text: Revuelta — Cuando los Herboristas ocultos entren al campo de batalla, si un permanente que controlabas dejó el campo de batalla este turno, agrega {G}{G} a tu reserva de maná.

foreignData.flavorText: Dans les sous-sols de la serre de Narnam pousse un jardin étrange et mortel.
foreignData.name: Herboristes cachés
foreignData.text: Révolte — Quand les Herboristes cachés arrivent sur le champ de bataille, si un permanent que vous contrôliez a quitté le champ de bataille ce tour-ci, ajoutez {G}{G} à votre réserve.

foreignData.flavorText: Nei sotterranei della Serra di Narnam cresce uno strano e letale giardino.
foreignData.name: Erboristi Nascosti
foreignData.text: Rivolta — Quando gli Erboristi Nascosti entrano nel campo di battaglia, se un permanente che controllavi ha lasciato il campo di battaglia in questo turno, aggiungi {G}{G} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignData.flavorText: ナーナム温室の地下には、奇妙で危険な庭園が広がっている。
foreignData.name: 隠れた薬草医
foreignData.text: 紛争 ― 隠れた薬草医が戦場に出たとき、このターンにあなたがコントロールするパーマネントが戦場を離れていた場合、あなたのマナ・プールに{G}{G}を加える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ドルイド

foreignData.flavorText: 나르남 저택의 지하 저장고에는 기이하고 치명적인 식물들이 자란다.
foreignData.name: 은둔한 약초 재배자
foreignData.text: 봉기 — 은둔한 약초 재배자가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종한 지속물이 이 턴에 전장을 떠났다면, {G}{G}를 당신의 마나풀에 추가한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Nos porões da Casa de Narnam cresce um jardim estranho e mortal.
foreignData.name: Herboristas Ocultos
foreignData.text: Revolta — Quando Herboristas Ocultos entrar no campo de batalha, se uma permanente que você controlava deixou o campo de batalha neste turno, adicione {G}{G} a sua reserva de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: В подвалах Нарнамской теплицы растет странный и смертоносный сад.
foreignData.name: Тайные Травники
foreignData.text: Бунт — Когда Тайные Травники выходят на поле битвы, если находившийся под вашим контролем перманент покинул поле битвы в этом ходу, добавьте {G}{G} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreignData.flavorText: 在纳南温室底下的地窖内，有一片奇异而致命的花园在茁壮成长。
foreignData.name: 隐匿草药师
foreignData.text: 反抗～当隐匿草药师进战场时，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则加{G}{G}到你的法术力池中。

foreignData.flavorText: 在納南溫室底下的地窖內，有一片奇異而致命的花園茁壯成長。
foreignData.name: 隱匿草藥師
foreignData.text: 反抗～當隱匿草藥師進戰場時，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物離開戰場，則加{G}{G}到你的魔法力池中。

name: Hidden Herbalists
originalText: Revolt — When Hidden Herbalists enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, add {G}{G} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: Revolt abilities check only whether a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn or not. They don’t apply multiple times if more than one permanent you controlled left the battlefield. They don’t check whether the permanent that left the battlefield is still in the zone it moved to.

Revolt abilities don’t care why the permanent left the battlefield, who caused it to move, or where it moved to. They’re equally satisfied by an artifact you sacrificed to pay a cost, a creature you controlled that was destroyed by Murder, or an enchantment you returned to your hand with Leave in the Dust.
Tokens that leave the battlefield will satisfy a revolt ability.
Energy counters aren’t permanents. Paying {E} won’t satisfy a revolt ability.

All cards in the Aether Revolt set with triggered revolt abilities use an intervening “if” clause. A permanent you controlled must have left the battlefield earlier in the turn in order for these abilities to trigger; otherwise they do nothing. In other words, there’s no way to have the ability trigger if no permanent you controlled has left the battlefield that turn, even if you intend to have one do so in response to the triggered ability.

text: Revolt — When Hidden Herbalists enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, add {G}{G}.
